Oh Hello there,

My name is Tumur(Tim), and I am an Android developer in the Bay Area - San Francisco.

https://github.com/timtbdev/Portfolio-App-2

Project Overview

App icon

Android-Kotlin

Portfolio App 2.0

October 2019

Android Jetpack
Material Design
MVVM
It's the second version of my portfolio app. It was written in Kotlin and built with Android Jetpack components and MVVM design architecture, and applied several best practices.

  • Components

    Single Activity, Navigation, LiveData, ViewModel, DataBinding, Room, WorkManager, MotionLayout, Paging

  • Libraries

    Koin, Kotlin Coroutines, Retrofit, OkHttp, Moshi, Coil, Leak Canary, Timber

  • Backend & Design Tools

    Firebase Cloud Firestore, Firebase Cloud Functions

https://github.com/timtbdev/Portfolio-App-1

Project Overview

App icon

Android-Java

Portfolio App 1.0

August 2019

Android SDK
Material Design
MVC
It's a simple Java-Android application where I want to show my skills and passion for Android development. It was written in Java and built with standard Android SDK APIs and MVC(Model-View-Control) design architecture.

  • Components

    Multiple Activities, Fragment, AppCompat, RecyclerView, ViewPager

  • Libraries

    Retrofit, OkHttp, Gson, Glide, Butterknife

  • Backend & Design Tools

    Firebase Cloud Firestore, Firebase Cloud Functions
